title: Wish your Snapchat username could vanish? Snap’s working on that
content:
Tired of your old Snapchat username? Well, one of the platform’s most highly requested features is almost here.

more…

The post Wish your Snapchat username could vanish? Snap’s working on that appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Snapchat users around the world can change their usernames starting February 23. This is one of the platform's highly requested features.
